text: Lakini kumwenu mweye, Kilisito kawagidila Loho Yang'alile. Na kamba Loho Yang'alile kokala mgati mmwenu, hamulonda munhu yoyose yawafunze. Kwavija Loho Yang'alile kowafunza kila kinhu na kija kiyowafunza cha ukweli na si uvizi bule. Avo gagogeni mafundizo ga Loho Yang'alile, na kaleni kwa kuilumba na Kilisito.
